main event: On 17 February 1953, an unidentified aerial object was visually and electronically observed by personnel of the 752nd ACAW Squadron in Port Austin, Michigan.
interesting points: The object changed color from bright red to pale white and back repeatedly,The sighting was confirmed visually and tracked electronically for approximately 17 minutes,Personnel involved had significant experience,Visibility was excellent at the time of the sighting,No other aircraft were reported in the area during the observation.
sighted object: an unidentified aerial object changing colors
witness description: Members of the 752nd ACAW Squadron, including experienced officers and airmen.
